content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Station at (-14, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14, -15) for coal extraction
- Wooden chest at (-23.5, -16.5) containing 38 coal

###Iron Ore Mining Station at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14, 23) for iron ore extraction (currently out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 116 iron ore

###Copper Processing Complex at (20-24, 18-21)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20, 20) for copper ore extraction
- Wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) for copper ore storage
- Burner inserter at (21.5, 21.5) moving items from chest
- Stone furnace at (24, 20) for smelting copper (contains 32 copper plates)
- Transport belt system:
  - Belt group 1: Running from (21.5, 17.5) to (21.5, 21.5)
  - Belt group 2: Running from (22.5, 21.5) to (24.5, 21.5) and (25.5, 18.5) to (23.5, 18.5)
- Wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5)

###Unused Smelting Station at (-11, 20)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (-11, 20) and (-9, 20), both idle without ingredients

ERROR TIPS

###Entity Placement Conflicts
- Before placing entities, check if the target position is already occupied by another entity
- When placing inserters next to buildings, ensure proper spacing and direction to avoid conflicts with existing transport belts

###Fuel Management
- Multiple mining drills are out of fuel (at -14, -15 and -14, 23)
- Maintain regular fuel checks and refueling routines for all burner-type entities

###Inserter Configuration
- Inserter at (21.5, 21.5) has no valid output destination
- Always ensure inserters have both valid pickup and drop-off points before placement
- When placing inserters, verify the entire input/output chain is properly connected
